channel.title: XSS on Salvatore Abello's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in XSS on Salvatore Abello's Blog

item.title: ez-class - B01lers CTF 2023
item.description: Overview We’re given a service that allow us to create custom MOTDs which is going to be used in a login page. We’re also able to see the preview of the login page with our custom MOTD in it. Of course, we can deploy our MOTD and show it to admins. This is a big hint, we can immediately tell that we need to do XSS. Analysis Let’s start by taking a look at the main page.
